Package org.nineml.coffeefilter.trees

Class StringTreeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.nineml.coffeefilter.trees.AbstractTreeBuilder
        • org.nineml.coffeefilter.trees.StringTreeBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    public class StringTreeBuilder
extends AbstractTreeBuilder
    Construct a "string tree".

    This builder can be passed to InvisibleXmlDocument.getTree() to build a string represention of the document's underlying VXML.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringTreeBuilder

        public StringTreeBuilder​(ParserOptions options)
        Create a string tree builder.

        If pretty printing is requested, additional newlines and whitespace are added to create an indented view of the XML.

        Parameters:
        options - the parser options

      • StringTreeBuilder

        public StringTreeBuilder​(ParserOptions options,
                         java.io.PrintStream stream)
        Create a string tree builder, specifying an output stream.

        If pretty printing is requested, additional newlines and whitespace are added to create an indented view of the XML.

        Parameters:
        options - the parser options
        stream - the output stream

    • Method Detail

      • getXml

        public java.lang.String getXml()
        Return a string containing the XML serialization.

        If a stream was provided to the constructor, this method will return null.

        Returns:
        the XML string, or null.
